sn43.3:0.3: 3. Placing the Mind and Keeping it Connected
sn43.3:1.1: “And what is the path that leads to the unconditioned?
sn43.3:1.2: Immersion with placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected. …”
